decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be retained for the lifetime of development in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Planning Statement; Application Supporting Document "Planning Contravention Notice"; Site Location Plan; Pre-Existing Site Plan Page 1 of 4 Rev 1; Existing Site Plan Page 2 of 4 Rev1; Pre-Existing Ground Floor Plan Page 3 of 4 Rev 1; Existing Ground Floor Plan and Elevations Page 4 of 4 Rev 1; Proposed Ground Floor Plan and Elevations Page 5 of 5 Rev 2.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 2 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 3 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time for the purpose of a residential unit, a separated office or any other purpose not incidental to the enjoyment of Flat 1C Argyll Gardens.

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of occupiers.
description: Detached outbuilding at rear for use as Gym/Storage (Retrospective)
